name: #OMDA Plank Theme
body:
# Hello Friends ^_^. I'm a big fan of elementary OS, and this is my first Plank theme :D. ### Installation Just Download and extract in
`/usr/share/plank/themes/`
Enjoy :D ### What it looks like? ![#OMDA THEME](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/daoudomardz/OMDAPlankTheme/gh-pages/Screenshot%20from%202016-11-01%2012%3A52%3A27.png) ### Who and why ??? it's just that I like to share what I do. and also I love customizing my Linux Distro > OMAR DAOUD
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
